channel.title: How can i connect to other servers and people connect to mine?
channel.description: without using himachi, and i use hybridscape. :( and how can i change my player rights with hybridscape? also when i use the ::char command i change stuff but then the accept button doesnt work

item.title: How can i connect to other servers and people connect to mine?
item.dc:creator: @learner learner
item.description:
@learner wrote:

I well give you my guild to make a no-ip.org( i would like to note i made this guild and i did ~NOT!~ copyright it)*

                            NO-ip.org guild to make public.

You well first need a email address witch you can get at à www.msn.com

Then you must go on www.no-ip.org to get your IP address for your TOTALLY AWESOME PRIVATE SERVER!

You must register for it (* note you can only make 5 ip address )
Once you register you have your IP name such à
(somthing.no-ip.org ( not actully server)

Click on add/host and you put in your name for your private server.)
(* you well see a 4 blank boxes at the bottom leave them blank!!! )

(* Only fill out what you want your ip to be called and scroll down to the bottom and click accept )
Then at the top of the screen you well see DOWNLOAD click on it and it well say would you like to download * No-ip DUC v2.2.1 * click download
Once you have download it, It well show your server IP click on the box and open your command prompt for your server and then go on www.codefasga.com to advertise it and there you go you got your server public and advertised.

                                                          And there you go all done by me Leaner

Read full topic
